subject: Re: Another tuner
author: eastern_paranormal
full_text:
I hacked an Olympus it was a great little radio. It told me to give it to Steve Hill, so I did :) That was his first introduction to a ghost box and he has been going strong since :)

Gab

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  This is from an older Radio Shack Digital Headphone tuner, their Olympus
> brand. The AM side gets more stations in this house than any other tuner I
> have.  both of these videos start off with some wierd coments coming through
> the radio as I started sweeping by hand. In AM "Pretty impressive actually",
> and on FM  "Yes, you may find it hard to leave(or believe) Frank"--Weird.
> 
>  Frank-S
>
